Posts.Content: lillykat8141 wrote: I am going for a biopsy in a couple of weeks and I am so scared. My husband is coming with me so I feel a little better. I watched a video on YouTube about it and it looks nasty.  Does it hurt, will I get a bruise, what should I do before and after the procedure? Thanks for any help you can give me.  Log in to post a reply
